ri:Resource.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.ivoa.net/xml/RegistryInterface/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/registry/RegistryInterface/v1.0/RegistryInterface.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VOResource/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/VOResource/v1.0/VOResource.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VODataService/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/VODataService/v1.0/VODataService.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VOTable/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-formats/VOTable/v1.0/VOTable.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/ConeSearch/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/ConeSearch/v1.0/ConeSearch.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/SIA/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/SIA/v1.0/SIA.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/SSA/v0.4 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/SSA/v0.4/SSA.xsd urn:astrogrid:schema:vo-resource-types:STAP:v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/STAP/v1.0/STAP.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/CEA/v1.0rc1 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/CEAService/v1.0rc1/CEAService.xsd
ri:Resource.title: Two Micron All Sky Survey (2MASS)

curation.publisher: WFAU, Institute for Astronomy, University of Edinburgh

content.subject: Infrared all-sky survey
content.description: The Two Micron All Sky Survey (2MASS) will provide a uniform survey of the entire sky at three near-infrared wavebands: J(lambdaeff = 1.25 micrometers), H(lambdaeff = 1.65 micrometers), and Ks(lambdaeff = 2.16 micrometers). A major goal of the survey is to probe large scale structures in the Milky Way and in the Local Universe, exploiting the relatively high transparency of the interstellar medium in the near-infrared, and the high near-infrared luminosities of evolved low- and intermediate-mass stars.Home page at http://pegasus.phast.umass.edu/

capability.description: Access to two applications: general ADQL query, and asynchronous cone-search where relevant/enabled.

column.name: cx
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinate

column.name: cy
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinate

column.name: cz
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinate

column.name: htmID
column.description: HTM index, 20 digits, for co-ordinate

column.name: ra
column.description: J2000 right ascension with respect to the ICRS

column.name: dec
column.description: J2000 declination with respect to the ICRS

column.name: err_maj
column.description: Semi-major axis length of the one sigma position uncertainty ellipse

column.name: err_min
column.description: Semi-minor axis length of the one sigma position uncertainty ellipse

column.name: err_ang
column.description: Position angle on the sky of the semi-major axis of the position uncertainty ellipse (East of North)

column.name: designation
column.description: Sexagesimal, equatorial position-based source name in the form: hhmmssss+ddmmsss[ABC...].

column.name: j_m
column.description: Default J-band magnitude

column.name: j_cmsig
column.description: Corrected photometric uncertainty for the default J-band magnitude.

column.name: j_msigcom
column.description: Combined, or total photometric uncertainty for the default J-band magnitude.

column.name: j_snr
column.description: J-band "scan" signal-to-noise ratio.

column.name: h_m
column.description: Default H-band magnitude

column.name: h_cmsig
column.description: Corrected photometric uncertainty for the default H-band magnitude.

column.name: h_msigcom
column.description: Combined, or total photometric uncertainty for the default H-band magnitude.

column.name: h_snr
column.description: H-band "scan" signal-to-noise ratio.

column.name: k_m
column.description: Default Ks-band magnitude

column.name: k_cmsig
column.description: Corrected photometric uncertainty for the default Ks-band magnitude.

column.name: k_msigcom
column.description: Combined, or total photometric uncertainty for the default Ks-band magnitude.

column.name: k_snr
column.description: Ks-band "scan" signal-to-noise ratio.

column.name: ph_qual
column.description: Photometric quality flag.

column.name: rd_flg
column.description: Read flag.

column.name: bl_flg
column.description: Blend flag.

column.name: cc_flg
column.description: Contamination and confusion flag.

column.name: ndet
column.description: Frame detection statistics.

column.name: prox
column.description: Proximity.

column.name: pxpa
column.description: The position angle on the sky of the vector from the source to the nearest neighbor in the PSC, in degrees East of North.

column.name: pxcntr
column.description: The pts_key value of the nearest source in the PSC.

column.name: gal_contam
column.description: Extended source "contamination" flag.

column.name: mp_flg
column.description: Minor Planet Flag.

column.name: pts_key
column.description: A unique identification number for the PSC source.

column.name: hemis
column.description: Hemisphere code for the TWOMASS Observatory from which this source was observed.

column.name: date
column.description: The observation reference date for this source expressed in ISO standard format. (YYYY-MM-DD)

column.name: scan
column.description: The nightly scan number in which the source was detected.

column.name: glon
column.description: Galactic longitude rounded to 0.001 deg.

column.name: glat
column.description: Galactic latitude rounded to 0.001 deg.

column.name: x_scan
column.description: Mean cross-scan focal plane position of the source in the Universal scan (U-scan) coordinate system.

column.name: jdate
column.description: The Julian Date of the source measurement accurate to +-30 seconds.

column.name: j_psfchi
column.description: Reduced chi-squared goodness-of-fit value for the J-band profile-fit photometry made on the 1.3 s "Read_2" exposures.

column.name: h_psfchi
column.description: Reduced chi-squared goodness-of-fit value for the H-band profile-fit photometry made on the 1.3 s "Read_2" exposures.

column.name: k_psfchi
column.description: Reduced chi-squared goodness-of-fit value for the Ks-band profile-fit photometry made on the 1.3 s "Read_2" exposures.

column.name: j_m_stdap
column.description: J-band "standard" aperture magnitude.

column.name: j_msig_stdap
column.description: Uncertainty in the J-band standard aperture magnitude.

column.name: h_m_stdap
column.description: H-band "standard" aperture magnitude.

column.name: h_msig_stdap
column.description: Uncertainty in the H-band standard aperture magnitude.

column.name: k_m_stdap
column.description: Ks-band "standard" aperture magnitude.

column.name: k_msig_stdap
column.description: Uncertainty in the Ks-band standard aperture magnitude.

column.name: dist_edge_ns
column.description: The distance from the source to the nearest North or South scan edge.

column.name: dist_edge_ew
column.description: The distance from the source to the nearest East or West scan edge.

column.name: dist_edge_flg
column.description: Two character flag that specifies to which scan edges a source lies closest, and to which edges the dist_edge_ns and dist_edge_ew values refer.

column.name: dup_src
column.description: Duplicate source flag.

column.name: use_src
column.description: Use source flag.

column.name: a
column.description: Catalog identifier of an optical source from either the Tycho 2 or USNO-A2.0 catalog that falls within ~5" of the TWOMASS source position.

column.name: dist_opt
column.description: Distance separating TWOMASS source position and associated optical source within 5".

column.name: phi_opt
column.description: Position angle on the sky of the vector from the the associated optical source to the TWOMASS source position, in degrees East of North.

column.name: b_m_opt
column.description: Blue magnitude of associated optical source.

column.name: vr_m_opt
column.description: Visual or red magnitude of the associated optical source.

column.name: nopt_mchs
column.description: The number of USNO-A2.0 or Tycho 2 optical sources found within a 5" radius of the TWOMASS position.

column.name: ext_key
column.description: Unique identification number of the record in the XSC that corresponds to this point source.

column.name: scan_key
column.description: Unique identification number of the record in the Scan Information Table that corresponds to the survey scan in which this source was detected.

column.name: coadd_key
column.description: Unique identification number of the record in the Atlas Image Data Table (NOT YET AVAILABLE) that corresponds to Image in which the position of this source falls.

column.name: coadd
column.description: Sequence number of the Atlas Image in which the position of this source falls.

column.name: cx
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinate POS_EQ_X

column.name: cy
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinate POS_EQ_Y

column.name: cz
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinate POS_EQ_Z

column.name: htmID
column.description: HTM index, 20 digits, for co-ordinate POS_GENERAL

column.name: scan_key
column.description: the unique identification number for this scan.

column.name: hemis
column.description: Observatory from which data were obtained: "n" = north = Mt. Hopkins, "s" = south = Cerro Tololo.

column.name: date
column.description: The observation reference date for this scan expressed in ISO standard format. (YYYY-MM-DD)

column.name: scan
column.description: Scan number (unique within date).

column.name: tile
column.description: Tile identification number.

column.name: ra
column.description: Right ascension of scan center for equinox J2000.

column.name: dec
column.description: Declination of scan center for equinox J2000.

column.name: glon
column.description: Galactic longitude of scan center, as computed from ra and dec above.

column.name: glat
column.description: Galactic latitude of scan center, as computed from ra and dec above.

column.name: ra_1
column.description: J2000 right ascension of the eastern corner at start of scan.

column.name: dec_1
column.description: J2000 declination of the eastern corner at start of scan.

column.name: ra_2
column.description: J2000 right ascension of the western corner at start of scan.

column.name: dec_2
column.description: J2000 declination of the western corner at start of scan.

column.name: ra_3
column.description: J2000 right ascension of the eastern corner at end of scan.

column.name: dec_3
column.description: J2000 declination of the eastern corner at end of scan.

column.name: ra_4
column.description: J2000 right ascension of the western corner at end of scan.

column.name: dec_4
column.description: J2000 declination of the western corner at end of scan.

column.name: sd
column.description: Scanning direction: "n" = north-going, "s" = south-going.

column.name: qual
column.description: Quality score for scan.

column.name: hgl
column.description: Special flag indicating whether or not this scan has a single-frame H-band electronic glitch.

column.name: cld
column.description: Special flag indicating whether or not a cloud was found in the scan after comparison of its photometry to that of overlapping scans in the database.

column.name: xph
column.description: Special flag indicating whether or not another photometric problem, not obviously cloud related, was found in the scan after comparing its photometry to that of overlapping scans.

column.name: anom
column.description: Special flag indicating whether or not an unusual problem was found in the Atlas Images for this scan.

column.name: ut
column.description: Universal Time (UT) at beginning of scan.

column.name: jdate
column.description: Julian Date at beginning of scan.

column.name: airm
column.description: Airmass at beginning of scan.

column.name: zd
column.description: Scan's distance from the zenith at beginning of scan.

column.name: ha
column.description: Hour angle at beginning of scan.

column.name: rh
column.description: Relative humidity of telescope enclosure at beginning of scan.

column.name: air_temp
column.description: Air temperature at beginning of scan.

column.name: tel_temp
column.description: Telescope girdle temperature at beginning of scan.

column.name: focus
column.description: Focus setting of telescope at beginning of scan.

column.name: hry
column.description: Flag indicating the H-band array configuration for the camera.

column.name: c_strat
column.description: Flag indicating the calibration strategy for this night's data.

column.name: j_zp_ap
column.description: Photometric zero-point for J-band aperture photometry.

column.name: h_zp_ap
column.description: Photometric zero-point for H-band aperture photometry.

column.name: k_zp_ap
column.description: Photometric zero-point for Ks-band aperture photometry.

column.name: h_zperr_ap
column.description: RMS-error of zero-point for H-band aperture photometry

column.name: k_zperr_ap
column.description: RMS-error of zero-point for Ks-band aperture photometry

column.name: j_n_snr10
column.description: Number of point sources at J-band with SNR>10 (instrumental mag <=15.8)

column.name: h_n_snr10
column.description: Number of point sources at H-band with SNR>10 (instrumental mag <=15.1)

column.name: k_n_snr10
column.description: Number of point sources at Ks-band with SNR>10 (instrumental mag <=14.3)

column.name: n_ext
column.description: Number of regular extended sources detected in scan.

column.name: j_shape_avg
column.description: J-band average seeing shape for scan.

column.name: h_shape_avg
column.description: H-band average seeing shape for scan.

column.name: k_shape_avg
column.description: Ks-band average seeing shape for scan.

column.name: j_shape_rms
column.description: RMS-error of J-band average seeing shape.

column.name: h_shape_rms
column.description: RMS-error of H-band average seeing shape.

column.name: k_shape_rms
column.description: RMS-error of Ks-band average seeing shape.

column.name: j_2mrat
column.description: J-band average 2nd image moment ratio.

column.name: h_2mrat
column.description: H-band average 2nd image moment ratio.

column.name: k_2mrat
column.description: Ks-band average 2nd image moment ratio.

column.name: j_psp
column.description: J-band photometric sensitivity paramater (PSP).

column.name: h_psp
column.description: H-band photometric sensitivity paramater (PSP).

column.name: k_psp
column.description: Ks-band photometric sensitivity paramater (PSP).

column.name: j_pts_noise
column.description: Base-10 logarithm of the mode of the noise distribution for all point source detections in the scan, where the noise is estimated from the measured J-band photometric errors and is expressed in units of mJy.

column.name: h_pts_noise
column.description: Base-10 logarithm of the mode of the noise distribution for all point source detections in the scan, where the noise is estimated from the measured H-band photometric errors and is expressed in units of mJy.

column.name: k_pts_noise
column.description: Base-10 logarithm of the mode of the noise distribution for all point source detections in the scan, where the noise is estimated from the measured Ks-band photometric errors and is expressed in units of mJy.

column.name: j_msnr10
column.description: The estimated J-band magnitude at which SNR=10 is achieved for this scan.

column.name: h_msnr10
column.description: The estimated H-band magnitude at which SNR=10 is achieved for this scan.

column.name: k_msnr10
column.description: The estimated Ks-band magnitude at which SNR=10 is achieved for this scan.

column.name: rel0
column.description: Flag indicating whether the scan is contained in the TWOMASS Sampler Release.

column.name: rel1
column.description: Flag indicating whether the scan is contained in the TWOMASS First Incremental Data Release (IDR1).

column.name: rel2
column.description: Flag indicating whether the scan is contained in the TWOMASS Second Incremental Data Release (IDR2).

column.name: cx
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinate POS_EQ_X

column.name: cy
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinate POS_EQ_Y

column.name: cz
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinate POS_EQ_Z

column.name: htmID
column.description: HTM index, 20 digits, for co-ordinate POS_GENERAL

column.name: jdate
column.description: Julian date of the source measurement accurate to +-3 minutes.

column.name: designation
column.description: Source designation formed from sexigesimal coordinates.

column.name: ra
column.description: Right ascension (J2000 decimal deg) based on peak pixel.

column.name: dec
column.description: Declination (J2000 decimal deg) based on peak pixel.

column.name: sup_ra
column.description: Super-coadd centroid RA (J2000 decimal deg).

column.name: sup_dec
column.description: Super-coadd centroid Dec (J2000 decimal deg).

column.name: glon
column.description: Galactic longitude (decimal deg) based on peak pixel.

column.name: glat
column.description: Galactic latitude (decimal deg) based on peak pixel.

column.name: density
column.description: Coadd log(density) of stars with k<14 mag.

column.name: r_k20fe
column.description: 20mag/sq." isophotal K fiducial ell. ap. semi-major axis.

column.name: j_m_k20fe
column.description: J 20mag/sq." isophotal fiducial ell. ap. magnitude.

column.name: j_msig_k20fe
column.description: J 1-sigma uncertainty in 20mag/sq." iso.fid.ell.mag.

column.name: j_flg_k20fe
column.description: J confusion flag for 20mag/sq." iso. fid. ell. mag.

column.name: h_m_k20fe
column.description: H 20mag/sq." isophotal fiducial ell. ap. magnitude.

column.name: h_msig_k20fe
column.description: H 1-sigma uncertainty in 20mag/sq." iso.fid.ell.mag.

column.name: h_flg_k20fe
column.description: H confusion flag for 20mag/sq." iso. fid. ell. mag.

column.name: k_m_k20fe
column.description: K 20mag/sq." isophotal fiducial ell. ap. magnitude.

column.name: k_msig_k20fe
column.description: K 1-sigma uncertainty in 20mag/sq." iso.fid.ell.mag.

column.name: k_flg_k20fe
column.description: K confusion flag for 20mag/sq." iso. fid. ell. mag.

column.name: r_3sig
column.description: 3-sigma K isophotal semi-major axis.

column.name: j_ba
column.description: J minor/major axis ratio fit to the 3-sigma isophote.

column.name: j_phi
column.description: J angle to 3-sigma major axis (E of N).

column.name: h_ba
column.description: H minor/major axis ratio fit to the 3-sigma isophote.

column.name: h_phi
column.description: H angle to 3-sigma major axis (E of N).

column.name: k_ba
column.description: K minor/major axis ratio fit to the 3-sigma isophote.

column.name: k_phi
column.description: K angle to 3-sigma major axis (E of N).

column.name: sup_r_3sig
column.description: Super-coadd 3-sigma isophotal semi-major axis radius.

column.name: sup_ba
column.description: Minor/major axis ratio fit to 3-sig. super-coadd isophote.

column.name: sup_phi
column.description: Super-coadd angle to major axis (E of N).

column.name: r_fe
column.description: K fiducial Kron elliptical aperture semi-major axis.

column.name: j_m_fe
column.description: J fiducial Kron ell. mag aperture magnitude.

column.name: j_msig_fe
column.description: J 1-sigma uncertainty in fiducial Kron ell. mag.

column.name: j_flg_fe
column.description: J confusion flag for fiducial Kron ell. mag.

column.name: h_m_fe
column.description: H fiducial Kron ell. mag aperture magnitude.

column.name: h_msig_fe
column.description: H 1-sigma uncertainty in fiducial Kron ell. mag.

column.name: h_flg_fe
column.description: H confusion flag for fiducial Kron ell. mag.

column.name: k_m_fe
column.description: K fiducial Kron ell. mag aperture magnitude.

column.name: k_msig_fe
column.description: K 1-sigma uncertainty in fiducial Kron ell. mag.

column.name: k_flg_fe
column.description: K confusion flag for fiducial Kron ell. mag.

column.name: r_ext
column.description: extrapolation/total radius.

column.name: j_m_ext
column.description: J mag from fit extrapolation.

column.name: j_msig_ext
column.description: J 1-sigma uncertainty in mag from fit extrapolation.

column.name: j_pchi
column.description: J chi^2 of fit to rad. profile (LCSB: alpha scale len).

column.name: h_m_ext
column.description: H mag from fit extrapolation.

column.name: h_msig_ext
column.description: H 1-sigma uncertainty in mag from fit extrapolation.

column.name: h_pchi
column.description: H chi^2 of fit to rad. profile (LCSB: alpha scale len).

column.name: k_m_ext
column.description: K mag from fit extrapolation.

column.name: k_msig_ext
column.description: K 1-sigma uncertainty in mag from fit extrapolation.

column.name: k_pchi
column.description: K chi^2 of fit to rad. profile (LCSB: alpha scale len).

column.name: j_r_eff
column.description: J half-light (integrated half-flux point) radius.

column.name: j_mnsurfb_eff
column.description: J mean surface brightness at the half-light radius.

column.name: h_r_eff
column.description: H half-light (integrated half-flux point) radius.

column.name: h_mnsurfb_eff
column.description: H mean surface brightness at the half-light radius.

column.name: k_r_eff
column.description: K half-light (integrated half-flux point) radius.

column.name: k_mnsurfb_eff
column.description: K mean surface brightness at the half-light radius.

column.name: j_con_indx
column.description: J concentration index r_75%/r_25%.

column.name: h_con_indx
column.description: H concentration index r_75%/r_25%.

column.name: k_con_indx
column.description: K concentration index r_75%/r_25%.

column.name: j_peak
column.description: J peak pixel brightness.

column.name: h_peak
column.description: H peak pixel brightness.

column.name: k_peak
column.description: K peak pixel brightness.

column.name: j_5surf
column.description: J central surface brightness (r<=5).

column.name: h_5surf
column.description: H central surface brightness (r<=5).

column.name: k_5surf
column.description: K central surface brightness (r<=5).

column.name: e_score
column.description: extended score: 1(extended) < e_score < 2(point-like).

column.name: g_score
column.description: galaxy score: 1(extended) < g_score < 2(point-like).

column.name: vc
column.description: visual verification score for source.

column.name: cc_flg
column.description: indicates artifact contamination and/or confusion.

column.name: im_nx
column.description: size of postage stamp image in pixels.

column.name: j_sc_r1

column.name: j_chif_ellf
column.description: J % chi-fraction for elliptical fit to 3-sig isophote.

column.name: k_chif_ellf
column.description: K % chi-fraction for elliptical fit to 3-sig isophote.

column.name: ellfit_flg
column.description: ellipse fitting contamination flag.

column.name: sup_chif_ellf
column.description: super-coadd % chi-fraction for ellip. fit to 3-sig isophote.

column.name: n_blank
column.description: number of blanked source records.

column.name: n_sub
column.description: number of subtracted source records.

column.name: bl_sub_flg
column.description: blanked/subtracted src description flag.

column.name: id_flg
column.description: type/galaxy ID flag (0=non-catalog, 1=catalog, 2=LCSB).

column.name: id_cat
column.description: matched galaxy's catalog name.

column.name: fg_flg
column.description: flux-growth convergence flag.

column.name: blk_fac
column.description: LCSB blocking factor (1, 2, 4, 8).

column.name: dup_src
column.description: Duplicate source flag.

column.name: use_src
column.description: Use source flag.

column.name: prox
column.description: Proximity.

column.name: pxpa
column.description: The position angle on the sky of the vector from the source to the nearest neighbor in the PSC, in degrees East of North.

column.name: pxcntr
column.description: ext_key value of nearest XSC source.

column.name: dist_edge_ns
column.description: The distance from the source to the nearest North or South scan edge.

column.name: dist_edge_ew
column.description: The distance from the source to the nearest East or West scan edge.

column.name: dist_edge_flg
column.description: flag indicating which edges ([n|s][e|w]) are nearest to src.

column.name: pts_key
column.description: key to point source data DB record.

column.name: mp_key
column.description: key to minor planet prediction DB record.

column.name: night_key
column.description: key to night data record in "scan DB".

column.name: scan_key
column.description: key to scan data record in "scan DB".

column.name: coadd_key
column.description: key to coadd data record in "scan DB".

column.name: hemis
column.description: hemisphere (N/S) of observation. "n" = North/Mt. Hopkins; "s" = South/CTIO.

column.name: date
column.description: The observation reference date for this source expressed in ISO standard format. (YYYY-MM-DD)

column.name: scan
column.description: scan number (unique within date).

column.name: coadd
column.description: 3-digit coadd number (unique within scan).

column.name: id
column.description: source ID number (unique within scan, coadd).

column.name: x_coadd
column.description: x (cross-scan) position (coadd coord.).

column.name: y_coadd
column.description: y (in-scan) position (coadd coord.).

column.name: j_subst2
column.description: J residual background #2 (score).

column.name: h_subst2
column.description: H residual background #2 (score).

column.name: k_subst2
column.description: K residual background #2 (score).

column.name: j_back
column.description: J coadd median background.

column.name: h_back
column.description: H coadd median background.

column.name: k_back
column.description: K coadd median background.

column.name: j_resid_ann
column.description: J residual annulus background median.

column.name: h_resid_ann
column.description: H residual annulus background median.

column.name: k_resid_ann
column.description: K residual annulus background median.

column.name: j_bndg_per
column.description: J banding Fourier Transf. period on this side of coadd.

column.name: j_bndg_amp
